subject: CNN Breaking News
body:
-- Angel Cabrera wins the U.S. Open with a one-shot victory over Tiger Woods and Jim Furyk.

Watch the latest video now on CNN.com. Access at http://CNN.com. CNN - The most trusted name in news.

>From Paramount Vantage comes "A Mighty Heart".
Starring Academy Award Winner Angelina Jolie as the wife of
slain journalist, Daniel Pearl. In theaters June 22.
